content:
lf-Care: The Traditional Approach”. Technical guidance and inputs have been given by Prof L.M.Nath. 
Technical Units and Departments at the WHO Regional Office for South-East Asia 
have provided necessary inputs on relevant chapters.
Content editing has been done by Ms Chandra Ramakrishnan and Ms Vijaya 
Sharma.
The final draft was field-tested by the following organizations on location:
•	Aparajita, VHAI, Orissa, India
•	Gonoshasthya Kendra, Dhaka, Bangladesh
•	Resource Centre for Primary Health Care (RECPHEC),Kathmandu, Nepal
Cover and page design has been done by Mr Brajagopal Paul, VHAI.Overall technical coordination for the publication was done by Dr Sudhansh 
Malhotra and Dr Boosaba Sanguanprasit from the Primary and Community Health Care Unit under the guidance of Dr Monirul Islam, Director, Department of Health 
Systems Development, WHO Regional Office for South-East Asia.
